body_html:
Also as stated in

https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/svd

tensor[..., :, :] = u[..., :, :] * diag(s[..., :, :]) * transpose(v[..., :, :])

We should perhaps update that to

tensor[..., :, :] = u[..., :, :] * diag(s[..., :, :]) * transpose(conj(v[..., :, :]))
(although we currently only support complex SVD on CPU)
body_text:
Also as stated in
https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/svd
tensor[..., :, :] = u[..., :, :] * diag(s[..., :, :]) * transpose(v[..., :, :])
We should perhaps update that to
tensor[..., :, :] = u[..., :, :] * diag(s[..., :, :]) * transpose(conj(v[..., :, :]))
(although we currently only support complex SVD on CPU)
body:
Also as stated in 

https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/svd

tensor[..., :, :] = u[..., :, :] * diag(s[..., :, :]) * transpose(v[..., :, :])

We should perhaps update that to 

tensor[..., :, :] = u[..., :, :] * diag(s[..., :, :]) * transpose(conj(v[..., :, :]))
(although we currently only support complex SVD on CPU)
